column2: Percent of patients who reported that their home health team gave care in a professional way
column3: Percent of patients who reported that their home health team communicated well with them
column4: Percent of patients who reported that their home health team discussed medicines, pain, and home safety with them
column5: Percent of patients who gave their home health agency a rating of 9 or 10 on a scale from 0 (lowest) to 10 (highest)
column6: Percent of patients who reported YES, they would definitely recommend the home health agency to friends and family
